author: Special Correspondent
V S
text:
RELIGION

Kannanur Mariamman Temple – Pappanaickenpalayam: 18th Kundam festival, festivity begins, installation of fire flag mast, 7 p.m.

GENERAL

Hindusthan College of Arts and Science: COM-PAC valediction, seminar hall, 11 a.m.

Ramakrishna Mission Vidyalaya – Post-Matric Institutions: Graduation Day ceremony, 10 a.m.

Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan College of Engineering: Conference on Emerging Trends in Wireless Communication and Networks, 9.30 a.m.

Sri Ramakrishna Engineering College: Recent Trends in VSLI Computation, ECE Conference Hall, Vattamalaipalayam – NGGO colony campus, 9.30 a.m.

Karunya University: Industry – Institute Interaction, EIE Gallery Hall, IInd Floor, 10 a.m.

Kalaivani College of Technology: Blood donation and eye screening camp in association with Shanthi Social Service and Sankara Eye Hospital, 9.30 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
